ogTitle: what you need to know to start the week - smarther news
ogDescription: the latest case on allegations of excessive force in the shooting death of rayshard brooks in atlanta, georgia - plus, what to know about spikes in coronavirus cases in america.
summary: The latest case on allegations of excessive force in the shooting death of Rayshard Brooks in Atlanta, Georgia – PLUS, what to know about “spikes” in coronavirus cases in America.
